description:
Complete a variety of missions & tasks, showing your pro driver skills!

Uniquely varied & exciting driving game! Think of a vehicle and it’s here! You’ll be driving small cars, big cars, trucks, a bus and even pilot a boat completing challenging tasks & missions!

FEATURES:
BEAUTIFUL NORTHERN ENVIRONMENT: Drive around an atmospheric island
IMMENSELY VARIED VEHICLE COLLECTION: Each one is different & unique
MULTIPLE TASKS TO ACCOMPLISH: Drive, complete maintenance jobs, fish!
REALISTIC TRAFFIC & PEDESTRIANS: Immerse yourself in a small island town

Enter a beautiful northern island full of impressive vistas! Drive along the breathtaking shoreline and discover a busy local town! Get the full picture of the area using a great variety of vehicles that allow you to see everything the game has to offer from multiple different points of view.

You will get multiple different tasks to accomplish - it’s not only driving from point to point, but also collecting passengers along the way, doing maintenance jobs on the streets and even fishing! Every one of them has to be completed in a timely fashion but also with safety and care!
name: Driving World: Nordic Challenge
